sentences: During the lunch break, the Financial Task Team, co-chaired by Marc Gillet (France) and Zhenlin Chen (China), convened consultations on this issue.
Discussion centered on lower than expected expenditures.
The Secretariat and the Technical Support Units (TSU) explained that some meetings were postponed or scheduled with other meetings, and that host countries often provide support.
The UK, with GERMANY and others, said governments needed guidance on required contributions.
The group will reconvene on Tuesday morning.
